2023-02-10T11-11-16Z.message: Actions job or workflow does not limit the permissions of the GITHUB_TOKEN. Consider setting an explicit permissions block, using the following as a minimal starting point: {{contents: read}}

2021-10-11T10-56-43Z.message: Actions job or workflow does not limit the permissions of the GITHUB_TOKEN. Consider setting an explicit permissions block, using the following as a minimal starting point: {{contents: read}}

2023-06-16T16-52-11Z.message: Actions job or workflow does not limit the permissions of the GITHUB_TOKEN. Consider setting an explicit permissions block, using the following as a minimal starting point: {{contents: read}}

2023-02-10T11-11-16Z.workflow:
name: sonar
on:
  pull_request:
    branches:
      - main
      - v*
    paths:
      - 'frontend/**'
defaults:
  run:
    working-directory: frontend
jobs:
  sonar-analysis:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - name: Checkout code
        uses: actions/checkout@v2
        with: 
          fetch-depth: 0
      - name: Sonar analysis
        uses: sonarsource/sonarcloud-github-action@master
        with:
          projectBaseDir: frontend
        env:
          GITHUB_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}
          SONAR_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.SONAR_TOKEN }}

2023-06-16T16-52-11Z.workflow:
name: sonar
on:
  pull_request:
    branches:
      - main
      - develop
    paths:
      - 'frontend/**'
defaults:
  run:
    working-directory: frontend
jobs:
  sonar-analysis:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - name: Checkout code
        uses: actions/checkout@v3
        with: 
          fetch-depth: 0
      - name: Sonar analysis
        uses: sonarsource/sonarcloud-github-action@master
        with:
          projectBaseDir: frontend
        env:
          GITHUB_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}
          SONAR_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.SONAR_TOKEN }}
